--- layout: default permalink: /sngcasmezhuveli/tools/gallery/wizard/add-album/external/s/2/ ---

Step 2: Create new album entry

  1. Fill the form here
  2. Click on "Create Album Data"
  3. If the browser warns you "This site is attempting to download multipel files", choose "Allow".
  4. This should download two files.
  5. Copy the downloaded .markdown file
  6. Navigate to _gallery in site root (docs folder) and paste the markdown file into it
  7. Now copy the downloaded .yml file
  8. Navigate to _data -> albums in site root and paste the yml file into it
Continue >
